entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl, mentioned as being in a cage.

entities.name: scourgify
entities.description: Scourgify is a householdy spell that Tonks uses to clean Hedwig's cage.

entities.name: cauldron
entities.description: Cauldron is an object mentioned as something Harry needs to bring.

entities.name: broom
entities.description: Broom is an object mentioned as something Harry needs to bring.

entities.name: firebolt
entities.description: Firebolt is a broomstick that Harry has, mentioned as being his pride and joy.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather, who gave him the Firebolt.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is a person who is envious of Harry's broomstick and helps him with his trunk.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a person who replaces his eye at the end of the passage.

entities.name: locomotor trunk
entities.description: Locomotor Trunk is a spell that Tonks uses to make Harry's trunk rise into the air.

entities.name: comet two sixty
entities.description: Comet Two Sixty is a broomstick that Tonks rides, mentioned as being inferior to Harry's Firebolt.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the passage, who has a Firebolt and needs to bring a cauldron and broom.

relationships.description: Tonks helps Harry with his trunk using the Locomotor Trunk spell.
Tonks cares for Hedwig by cleaning her cage using the Scourgify spell.
Harry owns the Firebolt, which is his pride and joy.
Sirius gave Harry the Firebolt as a gift.
Tonks rides the Comet Two Sixty, which is mentioned as being inferior to Harry's Firebolt.
